description: Prime root of n-th nontrivial prime power (A025475).
maple: cvm := proc(n, level) local f,opf; if n < 2 then RETURN() fi;f := ifactors(n); opf := op(1,op(2,f)); if nops(op(2,f)) > 1 orop(2,opf) <= level then RETURN() fi; op(1,opf) end:A025476_list := n -> seq(cvm(i,1),i=1..n); # n is search limitA025476_list(30000);  # _Peter Luschny_, Sep 21 2011
mathematica: Transpose[ Flatten[ FactorInteger[ Select[ Range[2, 30000], !PrimeQ[ # ] && Mod[ #, # - EulerPhi[ # ]] == 0 &]], 1]][[1]] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_ *)
author: _David W. Wilson_
